review: This is not the first streaming product I have used.  I have played with a ROKU owned multiple Apple TV first generation, multiple Apple TV second generation and a third generation Apple TV.  I was so impressed with the functionality and capability of these machines that I have since sold all of my Apple TVs.  Everything from the remote to the on screen performance is phenomenal.  I did have a small issue with one of the remotes connecting, however after less than 2 minutes and a reboot it synced up and have had no problems.
author: jal9626

review: I have both an Apple TV and an Amazon Fire Stick TV. I actually prefer the Fire Stick. It has more features and I prefer the remote control. It a good value as well, considering it costs less than half of what an Apple TV costs.
author: River Gal "Linda"

review: Picked this up during (insert your own adjective) Prime Day. Had been using my iPad and the Amazon Video app to watch videos, but really wanted to be able to watch on my TV, without paying a whole lot. This little gadget exceeded my expectations - easy to connect, navigate, and super portable! Brought it with me on a recent trip out of town; within 5 minutes, I had it hooked up to the TV, connected to the hotel's WiFi, and the kids and I were having a movie night. I haven't downloaded the remote app as the included remote works fine for my purposes.
author: Z&O's Mom "Kate L."
